item.title: Event Loop Group
item.description: EventLoop & EventLoopGroup # EventLoop # What is an EventLoop? An EventLoop in Netty is a fundamental component that handles all the events related to a single Channel. How does EventLoop work? Single Threaded: Each EventLoop is bound to a single thread, and each Channel is registered with one EventLoop. This means all I/O operations of a Channel are always executed by the same thread, ensuring thread safety and consistency.
